amendment.description: Amendment directs the Government Accountability Office to conduct a study of two proposals to increase fees paid by applicants and petitioners for immigration services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in part B of House Report 109-84 to instruct GAO to conduct a study examining the impact of an increase in Temporary Protected Status (TPS) application fees on the nationals of countries for which TPS is available and the differential in cost between the current statutory fee and the cost-based fee proposed by Customs and Immigration Services. Instructs GAO to conduct a study on the premium processing fee system and its possible application to individuals and their families.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
